Articles.Content: Here is my follow up fan art after the devastation I made a few years ago that luckily was lost in the great forum wipe. It's situations like this that make me appreciate and just enjoy KSP and I hope you all enjoy it as well
That looks like a normal re-entry to me, Lumpy Space Program does not know of this, so-called "Safety".
It is pretty normal, but I try to be able to recover the science on my ships. Also, I do believe they have not acquired "safety" in their language.
